caption.title: Shift of species mean abundance center by ecoprovinces in the eastern United States during the last three decades.
caption.p:
210, Northern Hardwood region; 220, Central Hardwood region; 230, Southern Pine-Hardwood region; 250, Forest-Prairie Transition region (
44 ,
51 ). All three species centered in ecoprovince 250 shifted westward (rose diagram not shown). “Si*” indicates that the shift is statistically significant ( P < 0.05). NS, nonsignificant.
